00012 CObjectAI::CObjectAI(CMap *p_map, std::vector<CObject*> &objvect, std::vector<CPlayer> &Player,
00013       stOption *p_options, int NumPlayers, int episode, int level,
00014       char difficulty, bool &dark) :
00015 m_Objvect(objvect),
00016 m_Player(Player),
00017 m_difficulty(difficulty),
00018 m_dark(dark)
00019 {
00020  mp_Map = p_map;
00021  mp_Options = p_options;
00022  m_Level = level;
00023  m_Episode = episode;
00024  m_gunfiretimer = 0;
00025 }

00027 //////////////////
00028 // AI Processes //
00029 //////////////////
00030 void CObjectAI::process()
00031 {
00032 
00033  for( size_t i=0 ; i < m_Objvect.size() ; i++ )
00034  {
00035   CObject &object = *m_Objvect.at(i);
00036 
00037   if( object.checkforScenario() )
00038   {
00039    object.performCollisions();
00040    object.processFalling();
00041 
00042    if(!object.dead) // Only do that if not dead
00043    {
00044     // hit detection with players
00045     object.touchPlayer = false;
00046     std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00047     for( ; it_player != m_Player.end() ; it_player++ )
00048     {
00049      if (!it_player->pdie)
00050      {
00051       if ( object.hitdetect(*it_player) )
00052       {
00053        object.getTouchedBy(*it_player);
00054 
00055        object.touchPlayer = true;
00056        object.touchedBy = it_player->m_index;
00057        break;
00058       }
00059      }
00060 
00061     }
00062 
00063     object.process();
00064 
00065     std::vector<CObject*>::iterator theOther = m_Objvect.begin();
00066     for( ; theOther != m_Objvect.end() ; theOther++ )
00067     {
00068      if( *theOther != &object )
00069       object.getTouchedBy(**theOther);
00070     }
00071    }
00072 
00073    object.InertiaAndFriction_X();
00074   }
00075  }
00076 
00077  // Try always to remove the last objects if they aren't used anymore!
00078  CObject* p_object;
00079  while(m_Objvect.size()>0)
00080  {
00081   p_object = m_Objvect.at( m_Objvect.size()-1 );
00082   if(!p_object->exists)
00083   {
00084    delete p_object;
00085    m_Objvect.pop_back();
00086   }
00087   else
00088    break;
00089  }
00090 
00091  if(m_gunfiretimer < ((m_Episode==3) ? 180 : 50 )) m_gunfiretimer++;
00092  else m_gunfiretimer=0;
00093 }
00094 
00095 void CObjectAI::SetAllCanSupportPlayer(CObject &object, bool state)
00096 {
00097  std::vector<CPlayer>::iterator it_player = m_Player.begin();
00098  for( ; it_player != m_Player.end() ; it_player++ )
00099  {
00100   object.cansupportplayer = state;
00101   if(!state && it_player->supportedbyobject)
00102   {
00103    it_player->pfalling=true;
00104    it_player->moveDown(1);
00105    it_player->blockedd=false;
00106   }
00107  }
00108 }
00109 
00110 ///
00111 // Cleanup Routine
00112 ///
00113 void CObjectAI::deleteAllObjects()
00114 {
00115  // The real delete happens, when all the AI is done
00116  // If the last object was deleted, throw it out of the list
00117  if(!m_Objvect.empty())
00118  {
00119   std::vector<CObject*>::iterator obj=m_Objvect.begin();
00120   for( ; obj != m_Objvect.end() ; obj++ )
00121    delete *obj;
00122   m_Objvect.clear();
00123  }
00124 }
00125 
00126 CObjectAI::~CObjectAI() {
00127  deleteAllObjects();
00128 }
